config.allowUsageExplanation: The following settings can be used to manage the use of the app. If no configuration is made, all users are allowed. An explicit entry in the list of allowed users always has access, regardless of the roles.
config.allowUsersWithRoleText: Allow usage for users with the following roles:
config.rolesAndUsersAreExclusive: If there are users in the allow list, roles will not be checked
